Name: Logistic Inspection
Description: Should inspect all logistics business and logs.

Subprocesses.Name: Transport Inspection
Subprocesses.Description: Should inspect all transport logs and travel plans.

Subprocesses.Name: Transport Revision
Subprocesses.Description: Should see if every vehicle is in travel condition

Subprocesses.Name: Logistic Financial Review
Subprocesses.Description: Should see if everything in the logistics is according to finances pre stabilished statements.

Name: Job Assessment
Description: Should see if every open job is according to the company rules.

Subprocesses.Name: Interview Revision
Subprocesses.Description: Should see if the interviews are going as expected.

Subprocesses.Name: Seniority Review
Subprocesses.Description: Check if all staff has the seniority according to their skills.

Name: Tax Period Review
Description: Review and secure all income and spendings are going accordling to have a healthy financial taz period.

Name: Building Maintenance
Description: Assure a secure, clean and healthy physical enviroment for all staff

Name: Advertisiment
Description: Plan and execute advertisiment for possible client awareness.

Name: Security measures
Description: Assure that all staff and the company itself has a effective and functional security system.

Name: Technology Support
Description: Provide effective support for hardware and network issues.

Subprocesses.Name: PC maintenance
Subprocesses.Description: Ensure that all personel PCs are working as intended

Subprocesses.Name: Network Adaptability
Subprocesses.Description: Install and configure all network process to run accordingly with all internal protocols

Subprocesses.Name: Resources Planning
Subprocesses.Description: Allocate all necessary personel and necessary resources (such as notebooks and monitors) so that the development can follow without issues.

Subprocesses.Name: Squad Planning
Subprocesses.Description: Plan and allocate employees accordingly, so that squads have the necessary human resources to procees smoothly
